title: Kraken Ordered to Hand Over User Information to IRS
description: A federal court yesterday ordered the crypto exchange to provide names, physical addresses, and social security numbers.

title: JPMorgan Chase Refuses To Reimburse Customer After Imposter Walks Into Bank With Fake ID, Walks Out With $30,000
description:
JPMorgan Chase is saying tough luck to a customer after the bank handed tens of thousands of dollars over to an imposter with a fake ID. Justin Lee says he lost $30,000 after a man with false identification and an incorrect social security number walked into a Chase branch and convinced the bank to hand […]

title: Litecoin Closes In on Bitcoin in Terms of Daily Transactions, According to Crypto Analytics Firm IntoTheBlock
description:
Litecoin’s (LTC) price is on the rise as closes an ‘exciting’ second quarter, according to the crypto analytics firm IntoTheBlock.
